YongHow wrote:
> Hi All,
> 
> Just want to check if anyone know there is mockobject that
> can be used with JWebUnit to simulate the webserver,
> or it that possible at all ?
> 
> Or maybe the question should be
> how should one perform TDD with Web UI development ?

Part 2 of _JUnit Recipes_ can help you here, in addition to whatever 
other references people give you.

I also have a presentation online entitled "Test-Driven J2EE". Click the 
link from www.diasparsoftware.com.

It's a deep subject, so don't expect to understand it all by next week.

Good luck.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
